author: PR.com
title: FreaksForum.com 15th Annual Bad Man Football Handicapping Contest
text:
FreaksForum.com 15th Annual Bad Man Football Handicapping Contest
Take on 2007 Hilton Super Contest winner Joe Gaffney in the 15th Annual Bad Man Contest. Registration closes at 9PM Eastern Friday September 11th.
Las Vegas, NV, September 02, 2015 --( PR.com )-- FreaksForum.com is proud to present the 15th Annual Bad Man Handicapping contest.
This years field includes the 2007 Hilton Super Contest Champion Joe Gaffney and Chuck McDowell (Chuck Luck) a participant in the 2014 Golden Nugget Friday Showdown Invitational Only tournament.
Entry fee for Bad Man is $100 with the optional 5-0 Side Jackpot costing an additional $50.
Entries close on Friday, September 11th, 2015 at 9PM Eastern.
In this contest, you make five selections against the spread each week for the NFL. You earn one point for a win and zero points for a loss. The top point earners at the end of the year win the prize money.
For complete rules, registration and more information please visit freaksforum.com.
Freaksforum provides a great sports forum along with free sports picks, live odds, statistics and contests. You will find injury reports, gambling odds, live scores and much more. Join in on the action today.
Freaksforum has been on the internet for over twenty years and is one of the oldest sports forums on the internet. It's easy to become a member and it is all one hundred percent free.
